Job Title: Business Development Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Espire infolabs is looking for a Business Development Manager for US region, preferably in East Coast.
Role: Business Development Manager - USLocation: Preferably, East CoastDesired Industry Experience: 12+ Years
Relevant Experience: The incumbent should have at least 12-15 years in IT Services sales in the US Market with a proven track record and excellent sales and account management credentials. Candidate should have IT Services & Platform Solution selling experience with passion to Win New Logos & mining existing accounts. Proven experience in selling Customer Experience Management Solutions including CMS, UX/UI, CRM, CCM across different technology & platforms in Banking, FS & Insurance industry.
Academic Qualification:Post Graduation in Sales & Marketing is a must.Bachelor’s degree in computer science or IT will be an added advantage.
Role Description:Achieving booking, billing and profitability targets for the region.Prospecting, qualifying, solutioning, negotiating, and closing mid/large sized business deals.GTM strategy for new leads & pipeline, winning new accounts and expanding business in existing accounts.Understanding & experience in Banking, Insurance, FS, ISV, Retail, Utilities industrySetting customer expectations consistent with service offerings and delivery potential.Developing a healthy pipeline of suspects and prospects and accurately forecasting business deals to be closed.Maintaining contact and opportunity information complete, accurate and in a timely manner in CRM.Having a comprehensive channel strategy/multipoint lead generation.Attending and representing the company at various business and industry meetings and trade shows.Working with onsite and offshore teams to build proposals through to securing business and post contract management.
Desired skills:The ideal candidate must possess the following qualities:Must be residing in US, preferably based in East Coast region.Ability to work in US region, e.g. Green card, US Citizen.An in-depth knowledge of the dynamics of the IT services industry.Is a proven account "hunter" as well as a “farmer”.Manage customer relationships in Matrix support structure environment.Successfully pursued business that supports the core services as Customer Experience Management Solutions across different technology platforms.Established network of business contacts in Customer Experience Management Solutions area.Knowledge/experience in proposal writing, solution review, escalation management. Knowledge/experience with CMS, UX/UI, CCM, CRM, AMS, enterprise level products/services.Understanding and Knowledge of Engagement & Financial models.Relevant C-level contacts in the US market.Must be both dynamic and proactive in sales approach and be extremely solution oriented.Worked in or with offshore services provider.

Experience Level (if available): Director
